document.full_text: if an indictment is issued, avigdor lieberman will most likely have to resign, and since his party is the second largest in the governing coalition, that could force early elections.
document.title: israeli foreign minister faces indictment on corruption charges
lines_and_colors: if an indictment is issued, avigdor lieberman will most likely have to resign, and since his party is the second largest in the governing coalition, that could force early elections.
